name: Soweli
description:
Care for your creature :) Buy cool boots, hats and other accessories while battling against other monsters & evolving . . . eventually.

This game is built to function like a Desktop Companion similar to a goldfish. Leave it on in the background and check back in every so often to say hi and see how they're doin'

Drag sushi with your mouse or finger to feed the lil guy.

give him pets by right clicking on him to keep him happy.

Don't ignore his needs for too long or he gets mad >.<!

This is version 0.0.1 it features:

-Creature Care! 

-Menu System

-Beginnings of Toki Pona & Esperanto language support

Humble beginnings. Next update will feature the shop!

Long-term Goals:

-Battle system to level up your creature!

-more depth to the Creature Care

- Evolution & age system

-Name them!

-Day-Night Cycle

-Many language options

- A shop to buy cool cosmetics & other items

Above all the Main goal is to create a lil guest for your PC or Phone to keep you company while you work or browse.

Hope you enjoy!

oh! Any proceeds will buy me a hot tea(probably white strawberry) while I work on the next update~
